item.title: Structural Differences between Revolution Big Bore Cylinders and OEM Cylinders
item.description: Brian Nallin compares the cast structure of the Revolution Performance Bolt-On Big Bore cylinder to an OEM Harley-Davidson™ cylinder.
item.itunes:author: Revolution Performance
item.category: sports, racing, motorcycles, Harley-Davidson, Buell, performance modification, repair, big bore cylinder
item.itunes:subtitle: Brian Nallin compares the cast structure of the Revolution Performance Bolt-On Big Bore cylinder to an OEM Harley-Davidson™ cylinder.
item.itunes:summary: Brian Nallin compares the cast structure of the Revolution Performance Bolt-On Big Bore cylinder to an OEM Harley-Davidson™ cylinder.
item.itunes:keywords: sports, racing, motorcycles, Harley-Davidson, Buell, performance modification, engine repair, big bore cylinder

item.title: Redesigning the Ring Pack in the New Revolution Performance Piston Kits
item.description: The ring packs for the new Revolution Perfromance piston kits have been completely re-engineered by Wiseco for greater compatability with the Bolt-On Big Bore Kits. Brian Nallin explains the details of these rings.
item.itunes:author: Revolution Performance
item.category: sports, racing, motorcycles, Harley-Davidson, Buell, performance modification, repair, pistons
item.itunes:subtitle: The ring packs for the new Revolution Perfromance piston kits have been completely re-engineered by Wiseco for greater compatability with the Bolt-On Big Bore Kits. Brian Nallin expalins the details of these rings.

item.itunes:keywords: sports, racing, motorcycles, Harley-Davidson, Buell, performance modification, engine repair
